This solar water heater combines advanced heat-Pipe technology, energy efficiency, and durability, making it an ideal choice for anyone looking to reduce energy costs while enjoying a continuous supply of hot water. Seven SS Stars Brand of Solar Water heaters also offer other system capacities such as, 150 Liters, 250 Liters, 300 Liters and 350 Liters. products.description:
300 Liters Non-Pressurized Supreme Solar Water Heaters are popular high-quality solar water Heaters. They are made to last long and are highly adaptive to both fresh and borehole water. They come with an inner tank made of stainless steel to work with the rising use of borehole water.Â Â Â It allows water to get in it by pressure but will only leave at the outlet through the convectional flow. To boost pressure at the delivery, a hot-water-compatible pump can be installed to suck hot water.
The system is designed to serve a family of up to 5 people in Kenya. This may vary depending on your location and system exposure to the sun.
Free Delivery Within Nairobi Metropolitan

Closed-Loop System: The closed-loop design ensures a highly efficient and environmentally friendly operation. It minimizes the risk of heat loss and corrosion, contributing to the longevity of the system.

products.name: Agrosol 150Liters Indirect On Roof Indirect (Closed Loop) Solar Water Heater
products.description: Agrosol Solar Water heaters are very popular in Kenya. They are made in Europe and have become a favorite brand for high-end estates, hotels, and institutions. The system is supplied complete with a heater element and controller. It also has a 5 years warranty conditional to professional installation.

products.name: 300 Liters Bosch Indirect Pitched Roof  Indirect (Closed Loop) Solar Water Heater
products.description:
300 Liters Bosch Indirect Pitched Roof Indirect (Closed Loop) Solar Water Heater
The Bosch TSS 300Â Thermosyphon system is a close-coupled solar system with the tank and collectors both mounted on the roof. As it works on the thermosyphon principle of rising hot water, a pump, and controller are not required, making this a simple and robust solution. As it is an ÂindirectÂ solar system, a heat transfer fluid circulates through the collectors rather than the potable water. This system is therefore ideal in frost or poor water quality areas. The system is also backed up by electric boosting.
Download 300 Liters Bosch Indirect Flat Roof Indirect (Closed Loop) Solar Water Heater datasheet here >>>

When vacuum tube absorb solar energy and heat the heat pipe ,the working fluid vaporizes and rise to the top of the heat pipe condenser, when heat pipe condenser meet cold water and cool down, theÂ  working fluid will fluidity and return to the bottom of the heat pipe, so once and once again to repeat this process.
The pressurized solar water heaterÂ system has an inner tank, which is made using 1.2mmÂ SUS316 stainless steel using the latest automatic welding technology throughout the welding process. The tank has been high pressure tested to 10 bar.

As it works on the thermosyphon principle of rising hot water, a pump, and controller are not required, making this a simple and robust solution. As it is an ÂindirectÂ solar system, a heat transfer fluid circulates through the collectors rather than the potable water. This system is therefore ideal in frost or poor water quality areas. The system is also backed up by electric boosting.
